products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The matt, chalky finish of the cotswold in cosmic white is right on trend, and will work amidst a range of decor schemes. A matching wooden pelmet and bottom rail give this blind a streamlined edge, with no obtrusive detailing detracting from its effect. Perfect for a shabby chic theme in a light, vintage bedroom, the cosmic white will look stunning against sweet duck egg walls. Include pretty floral patterns in the room, whether in the bedlinen or accenting cushions, and don't be afraid to add a complementary shade of pink for extra depth.

products.title: Zambezi Taped Mirren Cream Real Wood

products.title: Cotswold, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. The finely crafted slats allow you to celebrate the way the light dances with the exquisite finish to create a regal aesthetic that is a joy to behold. Turn the upstairs landing into the epitome of understated style by adding silverton grey to your existing decor. Pair it with a matching lampshade and a canvas print to create a homely feel in one of the harder spaces to decorate in the home.

products.title: Cotswold, Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use. For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content.

products.title: Gloss Taped Cream Real Wood
products.description: The gloss range is the ultimate in sophistication; we have taken the timeless appearance of the wooden blind and given it a modern funky twist. This cream gloss taped blind combines a classic neutral colour with a stylish gloss finish to create a stunning blind that will look great in any room in your home. The matching tapes add an extra feel of luxury. products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal - Venetian Blind
products.description: In light, country cream, with a trendy, chalk finish, the cotswold's oatmeal is a pretty and neutral choice. The matt paint makes this blind unobtrusive yet inherently attractive, an effect that is only added to by its coordinating pieces and parts. Partner the oatmeal with a lush sky blue in a child's bedroom, where the pale tone of the blind will allow cute patterns and fun characters on bedlinen and wall hangings to stand out on their own.

products.title: Cotswold, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Pretty and subtle, the cotswold in dove grey has satin finish, with the faintest of sheens and a detectable wood grain aesthetic and texture. The paint colour is a pale grey, perfect for either contemporary or vintage settings. For a sweet and romantic pastel colour palette, group the dove grey with pale pinks and soft lilacs. Choose one for the walls, or paint opposite walls in each, then furnish the room with painted white or matching grey pieces.

products.title: Cotswold, Marble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Matt grey, and with matching components, the cotswold in marble grey combines the contemporary with shabby chic, due to its lovely, chalky finish. Sustainable as well as stylish, this blind offers bags of practicality with its heavy duty headrail and thick, durable slats. Construct a feeling of country vintage chic in the dining room by combining the marble grey with a painted white dining table and cute grey and pink accessories.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.description: Champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home. The finely crafted slats work in perfect harmony with the gentle fizzle of the colouring and the assortment of accompanying fixtures to create a unique visual that is truly something to savour. Origin deluxe, champagne - venetian blind champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Seashell White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other. The subtle use of colour and the effortlessly smooth texture evoke memories of relaxing down by the coast. Origin deluxe, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, City Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor. The depth and striking finish of the steely grey work in perfect harmony with the gently crafted wooden slats and the assortment of unique complimentary fixtures and features. Origin deluxe, city grey - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has created city grey to offer a contemporary reinterpretation of much-loved urban decor.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Warm Oak - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light yet, true to its name, warm, the origin deluxe's warm oak has a truly natural look to it, and the coated basswood, which is ecologically sourced, is durable and high quality. This luxury edition includes coordinating ladder tapes that are used to hold and control the thick, substantial slats. Combine rustic style with contemporary chic by partnering the organic yet modern warm oak with natural slates and white painted wickers.

products.title: Cotswold, Ebony - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cotswold ebony allows you to take modern decor in an exciting new direction with its unique blend of contemporary colour and classic form. With a slight satin finish sitting against a backdrop of natural light you'll gain a new appreciation for the finer things in life. Turn the master bedroom into your own little oasis away from it all with a little help from cotswold ebony. By opting for crisp white sheets and a selection of ebony scatter cushions, and a matching rug, you'll be able to transform your room in a single afternoon.

products.title: Cotswold, Smoke Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: With the faint sheen of its satin paint, the cotswold in smoke grey places a pale grey tone on thick wooden slats, which are treated to prevent cracking and warping, ensuring that this blind will stand the test of time. A matching pelmet, rails, and acorns provide a sleek and unobstructed appearance. Fashion a plain bedroom into a trendy, up-to-date designer haven by pitting the smoke grey against sunny primrose yellow walls.

products.title: Cotswold, Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a subtle sense of class to your home by blending in the cotswold in oyster, a painted, satin-finish venetian blind with a beautiful cream tone. Its luxe colour even stretches to its included accessories, such as the wooden pelmet and bottom rail. For a bright and summery vibe, all year round, pair the oyster with pretty coral hues, in varying tones. Paint a window wall in the master bedroom a bold and vivacious coral, and accent matching cream bedlinen with coral-toned cushions and throws.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Old Walnut - Venetian Blind
products.description: A traditionally coloured blind, the origin deluxe in old walnut displays a dark-medium wood with a natural, matt finish. The wooden slats hang from a matching wooden pelmet and are backed with coordinating ladder tapes, so that there is no distraction from the beauty of this piece. Embrace the inherent class of the old walnut and group it with similarly traditional colours and furnishings. For a simple yet effective style in the living room, opt for cream walls and sofas, and wooden flooring and furniture.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Charcoal Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing. By bringing the two together in perfect harmony, and adding a selection of easy on the eye fixtures, it creates a striking visual that will set the tone for the rest of your decor. Origin deluxe, charcoal grey - venetian blind charcoal grey from the origin deluxe range is the perfect combination of powerful colour and effortless finishing.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a natural tone, every slat brings an air of relaxation that will instantly make you and your guests feel at home. Origin deluxe, solitaire - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Cosmopolitan Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason. With a unique tone that allows you to create a homely and relaxing atmosphere in any room, it brings with it a sense of balance and poise that will allow you to add new depth and character to your decor in an instant. Origin deluxe, cosmopolitan grey - venetian blind cosmopolitan grey is one of the most popular choices from their origin deluxe range, and with good reason.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black finish. And, as well as a matching pelmet and rail, it comes with coordinated, high quality ladder tapes. There is no colour combination more glamorous than that of black and gold, so embrace the luxe and pair the two tones together in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Origin Deluxe, Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pure snow white of the origin deluxe in bright white has a matt appearance that is at odds with its smooth and streamlined feel. Teamed with matching, high quality components, including designer-style ladder tapes, this blind is a real style statement. Pit the bright white against a bold, focal feature wall, painted in a bright cobalt or dark navy. Alternatively, go for an attention-grabbing wallpaper to create the same effect.

products.title: Cotswold, Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmic indeed, the cotswold's cosmic white gloss is a magically glossy venetian blind, where thick, tilting slats are painted in a deluxe white sheen. All components, including a headrail, bottom rail, and acorns, are finished to a high standard, and are provided in coordinating tones. Bring a bold, vivacious shade of tropical purple to life by painting a feature wall and placing the cosmic white gloss against it.

products.title: Cotswold, Oatmeal Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Ideal for crafting a light and airy aesthetic, the pale and contemporary cotswold in oatmeal gloss provides a stylish alternative to a classic wood finish. The cream paint is high gloss which, in combination with the blind's coordinating accessories, creates a united and streamlined look. Transform a neutral room into a smart and usable home office space by mixing the oatmeal gloss with sister creams and on-trend coppers.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Transfix your guests with the distinguishing and dynamic kolsva deluxe in wengi, where bold sophistication meets classic, craftsman excellence. This dramatic, twilight shaded blind with coordinating supports and decorative trimmings, generates a demanding window arrangement with modern components and valuable utility. Fashion a creative master bedroom with striking characteristics and vivid colour by suspending the wengi against a vibrant teal background.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe, Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.description: For a homely and convivial dcor scheme containing authentic, basswood timber and extra designer detail, elect the kolsva deluxe sheesham for its wholesome, conker shade. Sourced from sustainable forests, these craftsman-built, quality louvres, with matching supports and decorative ladders, produce a glamorous window dressing that is both conservational and convenient. Generate a luxury living space by corresponding the sheesham with similarly toned, deep furnishings, and walnut-hued flooring.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe, Pebble Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: If you love the look of cotswold pebble grey why not take a closer look at their deluxe option? By offering you something you won't see everyday it allows you to take your decor in a new direction by opening your eyes to what is possible when you fuse design and functionality in perfect harmony. Turning the living room into your own little oasis away from it all is about setting the tone when it comes to colours.
